io.github.kensuke1984.kibrary.util.sac

クラス SACUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.kensuke1984.kibrary.util.sac.SACUtil

  • public final class SACUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Read/Write of a SAC file. (SAC: seismic analysis code)
    バージョン:
    0.1.1
    作成者:
    kensuke
    関連項目:
    SAC

      static boolean rotate(java.nio.file.Path sacEPath, java.nio.file.Path sacNPath, java.nio.file.Path outputRPath, java.nio.file.Path outputTPath)
      By rotating hoge.E and hoge.N, write hoge.R and hoge.T The rotation is done by SAC.

    • メソッドの詳細

      • rotate

        public static boolean rotate(java.nio.file.Path sacEPath,
                             java.nio.file.Path sacNPath,
                             java.nio.file.Path outputRPath,
                             java.nio.file.Path outputTPath)
                      throws java.io.IOException
        By rotating hoge.E and hoge.N, write hoge.R and hoge.T The rotation is done by SAC.
        パラメータ:
        sacEPath - SAC file which component is E. must exist.
        sacNPath - SAC file which component is N. must exist.
        outputRPath - for write SAC with respect to R
        outputTPath - for write SAC with respect to T
        戻り値:
        if the write is successful
        例外:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs. If sacEPath or sacNPath does not exist, if write Paths already exist.

      • writeSAC

        public static void writeSAC(java.nio.file.Path outPath,
                            java.util.Map<SACHeaderEnum,java.lang.String> headerMap,
                            double[] data,
                            java.nio.file.OpenOption... options)
                     throws java.io.IOException
        パラメータ:
        outPath - for write (If the file exists, it will be overwritten)
        headerMap - of write SAC
        data - of write SAC. The length must be same as NPTS.
        options - Options for write
        例外:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs

      • createTrace

        public static Trace createTrace(java.nio.file.Path sacPath)
                         throws java.io.IOException
        The trace is DEEP copied.
        パラメータ:
        sacPath - to extract waveform from
        戻り値:
        DEEP copied Trace from waveform in the sacFile
        例外:
        java.io.IOException - If sacFile does not exist, if an I/O error occurs.

      • readHeader

        public static java.util.Map<SACHeaderEnum,java.lang.String> readHeader(java.nio.file.Path sacPath)
                                                                throws java.io.IOException
        Read header values in a sacFile.
        パラメータ:
        sacPath - to read
        戻り値:
        Map of SACHeader in the file
        例外:
        java.io.IOException - If sacFile does not exist, if an I/O error occurs.

      • readSACData

        public static double[] readSACData(java.nio.file.Path sacPath)
                            throws java.io.IOException
        Waveform in sac file.
        パラメータ:
        sacPath - Path for a sac file
        戻り値:
        double[] of waveform data
        例外:
        java.io.IOException - if sacPath does not exist or if an I/O error occurs
